about_the_game:
Even before the release of "Dr. Livingstone, I Presume?", many people pointed out the graphic design of our game, which has become one of its distinguishing features. So, we decided to tell you a little bit about the creative process that accompanied the preparation of the game's artistic layer by creating this artbook.

Here, you will learn what we had in mind while designing all the objects and stages present in the game. You will also get to see concept art created during the production process.

We encourage you to view the artbook after playing the game. This way, you ll see all the things we've designed as we imagined them, with all the surprises and meticulously crafted "wow' moments. Not to mention the plot...
